keyword.term: EiffelEnvision, New Projects, Eiffel Class Library

paragraph.paragraph: The Eiffel Class (Precompile) Library Wizard creates a new EiffelEnvision ../../structure/index.xmlProject for reuse by other EiffelEnvision projects through the ../../configuring/adding_references/index.xmlPrecompiled Library mechanism. The project will be added to an active or new Visual Studio .NET vxconVisualStudioSolutionsProjects 0 Solution .
The wizard is separated into two pages. Overview and System Settings. You may switch between the pages by clicking on the name of the page, located in the wizard's left pane.
The Overview page presents a basic overview of what is going to be generated for the project as well as more information on the project wizard.
The System Settings page allows you to modify the settings for the system created when the wizard is completed. The following settings may be modified:

Use Eiffel Base Class Libraries
No selecting this option will force the project to include all of the Eiffel library sources instead of using a ../../configuring/adding_references/index.xmlPrecompiled Library. The Include Clusters option will determine what Eiffel Libraries to add.
When selecting this option will use the Include Clusters to include an installed ../../configuring/adding_references/index.xmlPrecompiled Library that best matches the selection.

Include Clusters
This option indicates what level of clusters to add to the project. The following options are available:
EiffelBase: Required base libraries for all Eiffel for .NET project
Windows Eiffel Library: Classes for generating Windows application using the Windows API (Not Windows Forms).
EiffelVision 2: Eiffel Software's platform independent graphical user interface library for creating Windows applications (Not Windows Forms).

Once you have set the appropriate settings for the new project, clicking Finish will create a new EiffelEnvision ../../structure/index.xmlProject. No project files are added to the project and the project, unlike other ../projects.xmlNew Project, will not be ../../../compiling_projects/index.xmlBuilt.
